title: [BUG] Handler not found for view SkiaSharp.Extended.UI.Controls.SKLottieView.
body:
**Description**

When I build the application using Azure DevOps Pipeline, I get this fatal exception thrown. However, if I locally publish in release
mode, it does not throw that exception.

I am running MAUI Android application, on a physical device, building with Azure Devops, by doing a publish in release mode.

It basically crashes on startup, since my first page displayed contains this code.

**Code**

```xaml
<skia:SKLottieView Margin="-60"
						  Source="lottie_earth.json"
						  RepeatCount="-1"
						  HeightRequest="300"
						  WidthRequest="300"
						  HorizontalOptions="Center" />
```

**Expected Behavior**

Does not crash.

**Actual Behavior**

Crashes.

**Basic Information**

- Version with issue:  2.0.0-preview.61
- Last known good version:  Unknown
- IDE:  Visual Studio 2022 17.3.6
- Platform Target Frameworks: Android .NET 6.0
  - Android: See below
- Target Devices:   Galazy A12
  
<details>
  <summary>IDE Details and Android Log Ouput</summary>
  
